title: #404 Shit on Shit
description:
It's hot one outside and on this ep as Joe see's Colin Quinn and Chris Rock at the Cellar before a ketchup emergency while Mark's home becomes the scene of a shit crime before a trip to SoulJoel's with ol' Ari Shaffir

Check out our new merch here! Shirts, stickers, phone cases, mugs, you name it!

https://www.teepublic.com/user/tuesday-s-with-stories
